tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Our journey with Kritika Mam is 6 years old now. From day 1 our son is her patient. She is a living god in our life. We had gone through very difficult phases and her treatment, diagnosis and excellent guided medications has enabled us to grow our child. We are still associated and we will be with her always. *** ** *** **** ****** ** **********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Very nice doctor, gives enough time to discuss and practical in recommending. One can discuss silliest of problems with her with no grim on her face.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
Nothing very negative but she shows very casual behavior,  I think one should avoid this kind of doctors.
We pay high fee and if doctor is not able to explain the issue and cannot listen the patient patiently then  we feel very disappointed. Will not recommend to anyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor told to visit again on Saturday if fever exists for 4 days. 4th day called for appointment for visit, they said to walk-in. When visited on saturday, doctor refused to attend saying full of appointments. Told to come on next Monday. Children can wait till Monday with fever? **** **** ** ******** ** *****

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review: Had visited her for vaccination last month. After paying the consultation charges vaccination wasn’t done because it could induce fever and my son has some exams coming up. She wrote some multivitamins and asked us to come for vaccination later and we need not pay the consultation charges again. When we went again after couple of weeks she asked us to pay the consultation charges once again as the last visit was for illness. When I pointed out that It was clearly written on the consultation sheet that we came for vaccination last time and multivitamins she wrote was something she did on her own. She behaved very rude with us. I felt very insulted. I would not advice anyone to visit her ** ****  ****** ***** ** ******* *** **********

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I used to consult her for my son for the last 2 years, ever since he was born. Was a great doctor, would not prescribe unnecessary meds - all this while at Motherhood. ** ***** *** *** ******* *********** *********** **** *** **** ******* ************ ***** *** ******** *** ** *** **************** My kid got some ear infection due to cold, and she prescribed meds for 30 days *** *** ***** ********* ** ****** *** ******** I consulted a well know ENT specialist the same day, and she confirmed there was no infection in the ear! ***** ***** *** ********* ** ****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Kritika is an extremely patient doctor, she makes sure that the child is totally comfortable during the examination. I definitely recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: We are going to consult her when baby had born.she is very nice and friendly doctor.She treats every baby very well, easily identify the symptom of disease and explained everything about baby without asking more.She check everything deeply.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Dr Krithika was very friendly towards the Kids. She won't recommend the antibiotics unless the situation is very serious. She tried to avoid the medicines that will have side affects and high dosage.

I strongly recommend others parents

tags: None
review:
Very good, the way she approahes the issues and shares the possible diagnosis with parents, brings in lots of confidence. I took my 4 month old baby for pediatric checkup and returned quite happy, by the way the issue was handled. 
Thankyou Doctor
